CodeList.Title: Duty or tax or fee category code (Subset of UNCL5305)

Code.Name: Standard rated
Code.Description: Local supply of goods and services

Code.Name: Standard rated
Code.Description: Customer accounting supply made by the supplier

Code.Name: Standard rated
Code.Description: Customer accounting supply made by the customer on supplier’s behalf

Code.Name: Zero rated
Code.Description: Supplies involving goods for export/ provision of international services

Code.Name: Exempt
Code.Description: Specific categories of exempt supplies listed under regulation 33 of the GST (General) Regulations

Code.Name: Exempt
Code.Description: Exempt supplies other than those listed under regulation 33 of the GST (General) Regulations

Code.Name: Deemed supplies
Code.Description: Supplies required to be reported pursuant to the GST legislation

Code.Name: Out-of-Scope supplies
Code.Description: Supplies outside the scope of the GST Act

Code.Name: Supplies from Non GST registered company
Code.Description: Supplies from a company which is not registered for GST

Code.Name: Overseas Vendor Registration, digital services
Code.Description: Overseas vendor registration regime for Business-to-Consumer (“B2C”) supplies of imported digital services

Code.Name: Reverse Charge
Code.Description: Reverse charge regime for Business-to-Business (“B2B”) supplies of imported services
